name: Boat and Stay
short_description: Suite comfort, convenience, and amenities for you and your boat—now that’s island life!
short_description_detail_page: The comfort of our beautiful suites, the convenience and services of our beautiful marina, and all the amenities of our luxury resort. Could island life get any better?
description:
Book this offer and enjoy:

  • Tropically inspired accommodations in 1- or 2-bedroom suites
  • Boat slip up 30 feet, trailer parking, and daily bucket of ice during stay
  • Shuttle service to Key West Historic Seaport (Downtown)
  • 2-hour paddleboard, kayak, or bicycle rental
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities
terms_conditions:
This package is available when 1- or 2-bedroom accommodations are reserved for a minimum 2-night consecutive stay. Advance booking of at least 3 days is required.

Overnight boat slip is included for vessels up to 30 feet. Nightly fee for boats longer than 30 feet is $3.50. Daily rates are subject to taxes and fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. 1 vehicle in 1 space is included. Additional on-site parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.
